attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I urge the government to pass a law making it illegal to discriminate against and bully people with red/ginger hair. All too often my friends , family members and innocent members of the public have abuse and bullying hurled at them just because they have naturally red hair.

Why is this form of racism being allowed to continue unchallenged? It is racism and it is wrong!
